title: Diagnose Orchestrator: Minimal Fix
description: Orchestrator flow: classify -> propose minimal patch -> WAIT_USER -> apply -> verify -> loop.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  FailLog --> Classify
  Classify --> ProposeFix
  ProposeFix --> WAIT_USER
  WAIT_USER -->|approved| Apply[task.apply_patch.generic.v1]
  WAIT_USER -->|edit| ProposeFix
  Apply --> VerifyBuild[task.build.${ecosystem}.v1]
  VerifyBuild --> VerifyTest[task.test.${ecosystem}.v1]
  VerifyTest -->|ok| Done
  VerifyTest -->|fail| FailLog
